post:
**"AheadCloud NetWorks"** proudly present its VPS Launch Deal on "LowEndTalk". At AheadCloud we aim to provide best quality and customer satisfaction is our primary concern.

Our customers include video/audio streaming providers, filehosts, developers etc.If you have any special needs for your project feel free to reach our team @ sales@aheadcloud.com. We will ensure you will have the best hosting experience with us.

**Why you should choose AheadCloud NetWorks services:**

+Server setup within minutes.

+No long term commitments – Flexible month-to-month terms

+Support for large no of linux distribution.

+Unlimited self reboot,reinstall,bandwidth graphs.

**+Strictly no overselling upto 20% resources are reserved to cope with spike and unexpected demands** 


**Special Launch Offer (Limited Stock)**:
    
    * Virtualization - OpenVz
    * Processor - 4Cores
    * RAM - 1GB Dedicated (+512MB vSwap)
    * HDD - 60GB (RAID Protected)
    * **Bandwidth - 1TB @ 100Mbps port speed**
    * Location - US 
    * Quantity - limited(25 only)
    * **Price - 4Euro/Month or 5$/Month**
    * Order - [Here](https://www.aheadcloud.com/billing/cart.php?gid=15)

Order before all the stock is gone 
  
_Update:_ use **HALL40** coupon to Get 40% discount (Multiple Uses allow per account)

142.54.170.67
